summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5595 for the improvement of East 43rd Street, from 48th Avenue Northeast to 50th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73603 as amended by Ordinance No. 73788, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
